text: Oriol Junqueras i Vies (; born 11 April 1969) is a Spanish politician, historian and academic. He was mayor of Sant Vicen√ß dels Horts. He was Vice President of Catalonia from January 2016 to October 2017. He is president of the Republican Left of Catalonia (ERC). ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish historians Category:Politicians from Barcelona Category:MEPs for Spain Category:Spanish academics Category:Autonomous University of Barcelona alumni
